# StringExtensions.AsStream method

Returns a new Stream from target String encoding by specified encoding type. If is null uses defaults encoding. If is null uses default encoding.

```csharp
public static Stream AsStream(this string target, Encoding encoding = null)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| target | Target string. |
| encoding | The character encoding to use. |

## Return Value

A new Stream from target string.
